gDescription: Kiba & Kumba: Jungle Chaos is a classic Jump 'n' Run game where you have to help the two apes Kiba and Kumba in their fight against the villain Dr. Slipp van Ice. Lots of action, evil robot penguins and countless traps await you in 4 different worlds.
Finally, to all fans of Nut Rush 1+2, the sequel Nut Rush 3 is available right now! This time the cute squirrel jumps from branch to branch in a snowy winter wonderland.
In this cute side-scroller skill game your aim is to help the kitten Snowball through 20 challenging levels. Jump over obstacles, catch mice and birds and collect keys to complete all levels!
In the platform game The Green Mission you take on the role of Buddy, a green blob in sneakers who is searching for a mysterious tomato recipe in an ancient cave.
In the platform adventure Key&Shield you take on the role of Buddy, a yellow blob who tries to rescue his friends. Run, jump and fly through challenging levels and defeat all enemies!

Princess Goldblade must fight the waters! In this classic Jump 'n' Run game you need to run from left to right and jump whenever necessary - either to gather diamonds or to protect the princess from dangers.

Sweets Monster is a 2D endless parkour game. The aim is to avoid all obstacles and to gather as much candy as possible to get a high score. Combo moves will increase your score and you will get a higher reward.
In Nut Rush you have to help the little squirrel to gather nuts and bring them safely to the nest. This cute Jump 'n' Run puts your skill and reflexes to the test.
One cute little bunny and an endless racing track? That sounds like Hop don't Stop - an addicting skill game full of diamonds, power ups and of course many obstacles and abysses.

In this cool jump 'n' run game Kiba & Kumba: Shadow Run evil genius Dr. Slipp van Ice is chasing Kiba and Kumba with his plane. Jump over obstacles and pits and help the two monkeys to escape to safety. Can you beat level 4 in this fast-paced action game and win the game?

In Nut Rush you have to help the little squirrel to gather nuts and bring them safely to the nest. This cute Jump 'n' Run puts your skill and reflexes to the test. Jump from branch to branch, but be careful not to fall from the tree. How many levels can you complete?
